translation_english: he was saying/she was saying/you (formal) were saying
example_sentence_english: She was always telling the truth.
We used to say that often.
They were saying it was late.

used with auxiliary avere; past participle detto

example_sentence_english: He said that it was true.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che io dicessi la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that I would tell the truth.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che tu dicessi la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that you would say the truth.

translation_english: he might say/she might say/you (formal) might say
example_sentence_italian: Speravo che lui dicesse la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that he would say the truth.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che noi dicessimo la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that we would say the truth.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che voi diceste la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that you would say the truth.

example_sentence_italian: Speravo che loro dicessero la verità.
example_sentence_english: I hoped that they would say the truth.
